short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifies Google Search URLs to include '&udm=14' when enabled.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very simple extension that allows you to toggle the addition of the &udm=14 parameter to your Google searches. No extra setup necessary; it works immediately after installation.

Support for region-specific Google domains is planned, along with further updates. Apologies, I've been busy with college.

If you wish to donate: https://ko-fi.com/baylor
